MacroOp.Name: OMNI_THREAD_ARGS_RAW_PTR
MacroOp.Brief: If defined, thread parameters will be @c void* types.
MacroOp.Description: A library macro/option that changes certain functionality
MacroOp.Synopsis: Defines the thread parameter argument type used by the library, either that of @c void* type or the omni::generic_ptr. For more information on it, see @h omni/types/thread_t.hpp @h and @h omni/defs/thread_def.hpp @h
